acid armor.name: Acid Armor
acid armor.description: The user alters its cellular structure to liquefy itself, sharply raising its Defense stat.

acupressure.name: Acupressure
acupressure.description: The user applies pressure to stress points, sharply boosting one of its or its allies' stats.

after you.name: After You
after you.description: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.

agility.name: Agility
agility.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.

ally switch.name: Ally Switch
ally switch.description: The user teleports using a strange power and switches places with one of its allies.

amnesia.name: Amnesia
amnesia.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

aqua ring.name: Aqua Ring
aqua ring.description: The user envelops itself in a veil made of water. It regains some HP every turn.

aromatherapy.name: Aromatherapy
aromatherapy.description: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status conditions affecting the user's party.

aromatic mist.name: Aromatic Mist
aromatic mist.description: The user raises the Sp. Def stat of an ally PokÃ©mon by using a mysterious aroma.

assist.name: Assist
assist.description: The user hurriedly and randomly uses a move among those known by ally PokÃ©mon.

attract.name: Attract
attract.description: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target becomes infatuated and less likely to attack.

aurora veil.name: Aurora Veil
aurora veil.description: This move reduces damage from physical and special moves for five turns. This can be used only in a hailstorm.

autotomize.name: Autotomize
autotomize.description: The user sheds part of its body to make itself lighter and sharply raise its Speed stat.

baby-doll eyes.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
baby-doll eyes.description: The user stares at the target with its baby-doll eyes, which lowers its Attack stat. This move always goes first.

baneful bunker.name: Baneful Bunker
baneful bunker.description: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also poisons any attacker that makes direct contact.

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.description: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

baton pass.name: Baton Pass
baton pass.description: The user switches places with a party PokÃ©mon in waiting and passes along any stat changes.

belly drum.name: Belly Drum
belly drum.description: The user maximizes its Attack stat in exchange for HP equal to half its max HP.

bestow.name: Bestow
bestow.description: The user passes its held item to the target when the target isn't holding an item.

block.name: Block
block.description: The user blocks the target's way with arms spread wide to prevent escape.

bulk up.name: Bulk Up
bulk up.description: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.

calm mind.name: Calm Mind
calm mind.description: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.

camouflage.name: Camouflage
camouflage.description: The user's type is changed depending on its environment, such as at water's edge, in grass, or in a cave.

captivate.name: Captivate
captivate.description: If any opposing PokÃ©mon is the opposite gender of the user, it is charmed, which harshly lowers its Sp. Atk stat.

celebrate.name: Celebrate
celebrate.description: The PokÃ©mon congratulates you on your special day!

charge.name: Charge
charge.description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. This also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

charm.name: Charm
charm.description: The user gazes at the target rather charmingly, making it less wary. This harshly lowers its Attack stat.

coil.name: Coil
coil.description: The user coils up and concentrates. This raises its Attack and Defense stats as well as its accuracy.

confide.name: Confide
confide.description: The user tells the target a secret, and the target loses its ability to concentrate. This lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

confuse ray.name: Confuse Ray
confuse ray.description: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

conversion.name: Conversion
conversion.description: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.

conversion 2.name: Conversion 2
conversion 2.description: The user changes its type to make itself resistant to the type of the attack the opponent used last.

copycat.name: Copycat
copycat.description: The user mimics the move used immediately before it. The move fails if no other move has been used yet.

cosmic power.name: Cosmic Power
cosmic power.description: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

cotton guard.name: Cotton Guard
cotton guard.description: The user protects itself by wrapping its body in soft cotton, which drastically raises the user's Defense stat.

cotton spore.name: Cotton Spore
cotton spore.description: The user releases cotton-like spores that cling to the opposing PokÃ©mon, which harshly lowers their Speed stat.

crafty shield.name: Crafty Shield
crafty shield.description: The user protects itself and its allies from status moves with a mysterious power. This does not stop moves that do damage.

curse.name: Curse
curse.description: A move that works differently for the Ghost type than for all other types.

dark void.name: Dark Void
dark void.description: Opposing PokÃ©mon are dragged into a world of total darkness that makes them sleep.

defend order.name: Defend Order
defend order.description: The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

defense curl.name: Defense Curl
defense curl.description: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

defog.name: Defog
defog.description: A strong wind blows away the target's barriers such as Reflect or Light Screen. This also lowers the target's evasiveness.

destiny bond.name: Destiny Bond
destiny bond.description: After using this move, if the user faints, the PokÃ©mon that landed the knockout hit also faints. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

detect.name: Detect
detect.description: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

disable.name: Disable
disable.description: For four turns, this move prevents the target from using the move it last used.

double team.name: Double Team
double team.description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

dragon dance.name: Dragon Dance
dragon dance.description: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.

eerie impulse.name: Eerie Impulse
eerie impulse.description: The user's body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

electric terrain.name: Electric Terrain
electric terrain.description: The user electrifies the ground for five turns, powering up Electric-type moves. PokÃ©mon on the ground no longer fall asleep.

electrify.name: Electrify
electrify.description: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target's move becomes Electric type.

embargo.name: Embargo
embargo.description: This move prevents the target from using its held item for five turns. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.

encore.name: Encore
encore.description: The user compels the target to keep using the move it encored for three turns.

endure.name: Endure
endure.description: The user endures any attack with at least 1 HP. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

entrainment.name: Entrainment
entrainment.description: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target's Ability the same as the user's.

extreme evoboost.name: Extreme Evoboost
extreme evoboost.description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Eevee, gets energy from its evolved friends and boosts its stats sharply.

fairy lock.name: Fairy Lock
fairy lock.description: By locking down the battlefield, the user keeps all PokÃ©mon from fleeing during the next turn.

fake tears.name: Fake Tears
fake tears.description: The user feigns crying to fluster the target, harshly lowering its Sp. Def stat.

feather dance.name: Feather Dance
feather dance.description: The user covers the target's body with a mass of down that harshly lowers its Attack stat.

flash.name: Flash
flash.description: The user flashes a bright light that cuts the target's accuracy.

flatter.name: Flatter
flatter.description: Flattery is used to confuse the target. However, this also raises the target's Sp. Atk stat.

floral healing.name: Floral Healing
floral healing.description: The user restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain is grass.

flower shield.name: Flower Shield
flower shield.description: The user raises the Defense stat of all Grass-type PokÃ©mon in battle with a mysterious power.

focus energy.name: Focus Energy
focus energy.description: The user takes a deep breath and focuses so that critical hits land more easily.

follow me.name: Follow Me
follow me.description: The user draws attention to itself, making all targets take aim only at the user.

foresight.name: Foresight
foresight.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

forest's curse.name: Forest's Curse
forest's curse.description: The user puts a forest curse on the target. The target is now Grass type as well.

gastro acid.name: Gastro Acid
gastro acid.description: The user hurls up its stomach acids on the target. The fluid eliminates the effect of the target's Ability.

gear up.name: Gear Up
gear up.description: The user engages its gears to raise the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of ally PokÃ©mon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

geomancy.name: Geomancy
geomancy.description: The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats on the next turn.

glare.name: Glare
glare.description: The user intimidates the target with the pattern on its belly to cause paralysis.

grass whistle.name: Grass Whistle
grass whistle.description: The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the target into a deep sleep.

grassy terrain.name: Grassy Terrain
grassy terrain.description: The user turns the ground to grass for five turns. This restores the HP of PokÃ©mon on the ground a little every turn and powers up Grass type-moves.

gravity.name: Gravity

growl.name: Growl
growl.description: The user growls in an endearing way, making opposing PokÃ©mon less wary. This lowers their Attack stat.

growth.name: Growth
growth.description: The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

grudge.name: Grudge
grudge.description: If the user faints, the user's grudge fully depletes the PP of the opponent's move that knocked it out.

guard split.name: Guard Split
guard split.description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Defense and Sp. Def stats with those of the target.

guard swap.name: Guard Swap
guard swap.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Defense and Sp. Def stats with the target.

hail.name: Hail
hail.description: The user summons a hailstorm lasting five turns. It damages all PokÃ©mon except the Ice type.

happy hour.name: Happy Hour
happy hour.description: Using Happy Hour doubles the amount of prize money received after battle.

harden.name: Harden
harden.description: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

haze.name: Haze
haze.description: The user creates a haze that eliminates every stat change among all the PokÃ©mon engaged in battle.

heal bell.name: Heal Bell
heal bell.description: The user makes a soothing bell chime to heal the status conditions of all the party PokÃ©mon.

heal block.name: Heal Block
heal block.description: For five turns, the user prevents the opposing team from using any moves, Abilities, or held items that recover HP.

heal order.name: Heal Order
heal order.description: The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.

heal pulse.name: Heal Pulse
heal pulse.description: The user emits a healing pulse that restores the target's HP by up to half of its max HP.

healing wish.name: Healing Wish
healing wish.description: The user faints. In return, the PokÃ©mon taking its place will have its HP restored and status conditions cured.

heart swap.name: Heart Swap
heart swap.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch stat changes with the target.

helping hand.name: Helping Hand
helping hand.description: The user assists an ally by boosting the power of that ally's attack.

hold hands.name: Hold Hands
hold hands.description: The user and an ally hold hands. This makes them very happy.

hone claws.name: Hone Claws
hone claws.description: The user sharpens its claws to boost its Attack stat and accuracy.

howl.name: Howl
howl.description: The user howls loudly to raise its spirit, which raises its Attack stat.

hypnosis.name: Hypnosis
hypnosis.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

imprison.name: Imprison
imprison.description: If opposing PokÃ©mon know any move also known by the user, they are prevented from using it.

ingrain.name: Ingrain
ingrain.description: The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn. Because it's rooted, it can't switch out.

instruct.name: Instruct
instruct.description: The user instructs the target to use the target's last move again.

ion deluge.name: Ion Deluge
ion deluge.description: The user disperses electrically charged particles, which changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type moves.

iron defense.name: Iron Defense
iron defense.description: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

kinesis.name: Kinesis
kinesis.description: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. This lowers the target's accuracy.

king's shield.name: King's Shield
king's shield.description: The user takes a defensive stance while it protects itself from damage. It also harshly lowers the Attack stat of any attacker who makes direct contact.

laser focus.name: Laser Focus
laser focus.description: The user concentrates intensely. The attack on the next turn always results in a critical hit.

leech seed.name: Leech Seed
leech seed.description: A seed is planted on the target. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

leer.name: Leer
leer.description: The user gives opposing PokÃ©mon an intimidating leer that lowers the Defense stat.

light screen.name: Light Screen
light screen.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.

lock-on.name: Lock-On
lock-on.description: The user takes sure aim at the target. This ensures the next attack does not miss the target.

lovely kiss.name: Lovely Kiss
lovely kiss.description: With a scary face, the user tries to force a kiss on the target. If it succeeds, the target falls asleep.

lucky chant.name: Lucky Chant
lucky chant.description: The user chants an incantation toward the sky, preventing opposing PokÃ©mon from landing critical hits for five turns.

lunar dance.name: Lunar Dance
lunar dance.description: The user faints. In return, the PokÃ©mon taking its place will have its status and HP fully restored.

magic coat.name: Magic Coat
magic coat.description: A barrier reflects back to the target moves like Leech Seed and moves that damage status.

magic room.name: Magic Room
magic room.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which PokÃ©mon's held items lose their effects for five turns.

magnet rise.name: Magnet Rise
magnet rise.description: The user levitates using electrically generated magnetism for five turns.

magnetic flux.name: Magnetic Flux
magnetic flux.description: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally PokÃ©mon with the Plus or Minus Ability.

mat block.name: Mat Block
mat block.description: Using a pulled-up mat as a shield, the user protects itself and its allies from damaging moves. This does not stop status moves.

me first.name: Me First
me first.description: The user cuts ahead of the target to copy and use the target's intended move with greater power. This move fails if it isn't used first.

mean look.name: Mean Look
mean look.description: The user pins the target with a dark, arresting look. The target becomes unable to flee.

meditate.name: Meditate
meditate.description: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

memento.name: Memento
memento.description: The user faints when using this move. In return, this harshly lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

metal sound.name: Metal Sound
metal sound.description: A horrible sound like scraping metal harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

metronome.name: Metronome
metronome.description: The user waggles a finger and stimulates its brain into randomly using nearly any move.

milk drink.name: Milk Drink
milk drink.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

mimic.name: Mimic
mimic.description: The user copies the target's last move. The move can be used during battle until the PokÃ©mon is switched out.

mind reader.name: Mind Reader
mind reader.description: The user senses the target's movements with its mind to ensure its next attack does not miss the target.

minimize.name: Minimize
minimize.description: The user compresses its body to make itself look smaller, which sharply raises its evasiveness.

miracle eye.name: Miracle Eye
miracle eye.description: Enables a Dark-type target to be hit by Psychic-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

mirror move.name: Mirror Move
mirror move.description: The user counters the target by mimicking the target's last move.

mist.name: Mist
mist.description: The user cloaks itself and its allies in a white mist that prevents any of their stats from being lowered for five turns.

misty terrain.name: Misty Terrain
misty terrain.description: This protects PokÃ©mon on the ground from status conditions and halves damage from Dragon-type moves for five turns.

moonlight.name: Moonlight
moonlight.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

morning sun.name: Morning Sun
morning sun.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

mud sport.name: Mud Sport
mud sport.description: The user kicks up mud on the battlefield. This weakens Electric-type moves for five turns.

nasty plot.name: Nasty Plot
nasty plot.description: The user stimulates its brain by thinking bad thoughts. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Atk stat.

nature power.name: Nature Power
nature power.description: This attack makes use of nature's power. Its effects vary depending on the user's environment.

nightmare.name: Nightmare
nightmare.description: A sleeping target sees a nightmare that inflicts some damage every turn.

noble roar.name: Noble Roar
noble roar.description: Letting out a noble roar, the user intimidates the target and lowers its Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

odor sleuth.name: Odor Sleuth
odor sleuth.description: Enables a Ghost-type target to be hit by Normal- and Fighting-type attacks. This also enables an evasive target to be hit.

pain split.name: Pain Split
pain split.description: The user adds its HP to the target's HP, then equally shares the combined HP with the target.

parting shot.name: Parting Shot
parting shot.description: With a parting threat, the user lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats. Then it switches with a party PokÃ©mon.

perish song.name: Perish Song
perish song.description: Any PokÃ©mon that hears this song faints in three turns, unless it switches out of battle.

play nice.name: Play Nice
play nice.description: The user and the target become friends, and the target loses its will to fight. This lowers the target's Attack stat.

poison gas.name: Poison Gas
poison gas.description: A cloud of poison gas is sprayed in the face of opposing PokÃ©mon, poisoning those hit.

poison powder.name: Poison Powder
poison powder.description: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.

powder.name: Powder
powder.description: The user covers the target in a combustible powder. If the target uses a Fire-type move, the powder explodes and damages the target.

power split.name: Power Split
power split.description: The user employs its psychic power to average its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with those of the target.

power swap.name: Power Swap
power swap.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch changes to its Attack and Sp. Atk stats with the target.

power trick.name: Power Trick
power trick.description: The user employs its psychic power to switch its Attack stat with its Defense stat.

protect.name: Protect
protect.description: Enables the user to evade all attacks. Its chance of failing rises if it is used in succession.

psych up.name: Psych Up
psych up.description: The user hypnotizes itself into copying any stat change made by the target.

psychic terrain.name: Psychic Terrain
psychic terrain.description: This protects PokÃ©mon on the ground from priority moves and powers up Psychic-type moves for five turns.

psycho shift.name: Psycho Shift
psycho shift.description: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target.

purify.name: Purify
purify.description: The user heals the target's status condition. If the move succeeds, it also restores the user's own HP.

quash.name: Quash
quash.description: The user suppresses the target and makes its move go last.

quick guard.name: Quick Guard
quick guard.description: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.

quiver dance.name: Quiver Dance
quiver dance.description: The user lightly performs a beautiful, mystic dance. This boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

rage powder.name: Rage Powder
rage powder.description: The user scatters a cloud of irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user.

rain dance.name: Rain Dance
rain dance.description: The user summons a heavy rain that falls for five turns, powering up Water-type moves. It lowers the power of Fire-type moves.

recover.name: Recover
recover.description: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

recycle.name: Recycle
recycle.description: The user recycles a held item that has been used in battle so it can be used again.

reflect.name: Reflect
reflect.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.

reflect type.name: Reflect Type
reflect type.description: The user reflects the target's type, making it the same type as the target.

refresh.name: Refresh
refresh.description: The user rests to cure itself of poisoning, a burn, or paralysis.

rest.name: Rest
rest.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user's HP and heals any status conditions.

roar.name: Roar
roar.description: The target is scared off, and a different PokÃ©mon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single PokÃ©mon.

rock polish.name: Rock Polish
rock polish.description: The user polishes its body to reduce drag. This can sharply raise the Speed stat.

role play.name: Role Play
role play.description: The user mimics the target completely, copying the target's natural Ability.

roost.name: Roost
roost.description: The user lands and rests its body. It restores the user's HP by up to half of its max HP.

rototiller.name: Rototiller
rototiller.description: Tilling the soil, the user makes it easier for plants to grow. This raises the Attack and Sp. Atk stats of Grass-type PokÃ©mon.

safeguard.name: Safeguard
safeguard.description: The user creates a protective field that prevents status conditions for five turns.

sand attack.name: Sand Attack
sand attack.description: Sand is hurled in the target's face, reducing the target's accuracy.

sandstorm.name: Sandstorm
sandstorm.description: A five-turn sandstorm is summoned to hurt all combatants except the Rock, Ground, and Steel types. It raises the Sp. Def stat of Rock types.

scary face.name: Scary Face
scary face.description: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.

screech.name: Screech
screech.description: An earsplitting screech harshly lowers the target's Defense stat.

sharpen.name: Sharpen
sharpen.description: The user makes its edges more jagged,  which raises its Attack stat.

shell smash.name: Shell Smash
shell smash.description: The user breaks its shell, which lowers Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raises its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

shift gear.name: Shift Gear
shift gear.description: The user rotates its gears, raising its Attack stat and sharply raising its Speed stat.

shore up.name: Shore Up
shore up.description: The user regains up to half of its max HP. It restores more HP in a sandstorm.

simple beam.name: Simple Beam
simple beam.description: The user's mysterious psychic wave changes the target's Ability to Simple.

sing.name: Sing
sing.description: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

sketch.name: Sketch
sketch.description: It enables the user to permanently learn the move last used by the target. Once used, Sketch disappears.

skill swap.name: Skill Swap
skill swap.description: The user employs its psychic power to exchange Abilities with the target.

slack off.name: Slack Off
slack off.description: The user slacks off, restoring its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

sleep powder.name: Sleep Powder
sleep powder.description: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

sleep talk.name: Sleep Talk
sleep talk.description: While it is asleep, the user randomly uses one of the moves it knows.

smokescreen.name: Smokescreen
smokescreen.description: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target's accuracy.

snatch.name: Snatch
snatch.description: The user steals the effects of any attempts to use a healing or stat-changing move.

soak.name: Soak
soak.description: The user shoots a torrent of water at the target and changes the target's type to Water.

soft-boiled.name: Soft-Boiled
soft-boiled.description: The user restores its own HP by up to half of its max HP.

speed swap.name: Speed Swap
speed swap.description: The user exchanges Speed stats with the target.

spider web.name: Spider Web
spider web.description: The user ensnares the target with thin, gooey silk so it can't flee from battle.

spikes.name: Spikes
spikes.description: The user lays a trap of spikes at the opposing team's feet. The trap hurts PokÃ©mon that switch into battle.

spiky shield.name: Spiky Shield
spiky shield.description: In addition to protecting the user from attacks, this move also damages any attacker who makes direct contact.

spite.name: Spite
spite.description: The user unleashes its grudge on the move last used by the target by cutting 4 PP from it.

splash.name: Splash
splash.description: The user just flops and splashes around to no effect at all...

spore.name: Spore
spore.description: The user scatters bursts of spores that induce sleep.

spotlight.name: Spotlight
spotlight.description: The user shines a spotlight on the target so that only the target will be attacked during the turn.

stealth rock.name: Stealth Rock
stealth rock.description: The user lays a trap of levitating stones around the opposing team. The trap hurts opposing PokÃ©mon that switch into battle.

sticky web.name: Sticky Web
sticky web.description: The user weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stat upon switching into battle.

stockpile.name: Stockpile
stockpile.description: The user charges up power and raises both its Defense and Sp. Def stats. The move can be used three times.

strength sap.name: Strength Sap
strength sap.description: The user restores its HP by the same amount as the target's Attack stat. It also lowers the target's Attack stat.

string shot.name: String Shot
string shot.description: The opposing PokÃ©mon are bound with silk blown from the user's mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.

stun spore.name: Stun Spore
stun spore.description: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

substitute.name: Substitute
substitute.description: The user makes a copy of itself using some of its HP. The copy serves as the user's decoy.

sunny day.name: Sunny Day
sunny day.description: The user intensifies the sun for five turns, powering up Fire-type moves. It lowers the power of Water-type moves.

supersonic.name: Supersonic
supersonic.description: The user generates odd sound waves from its body that confuse the target.

swagger.name: Swagger
swagger.description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.

swallow.name: Swallow
swallow.description: The power stored using the move Stockpile is absorbed by the user to heal its HP. Storing more power heals more HP.

sweet kiss.name: Sweet Kiss
sweet kiss.description: The user kisses the target with a sweet, angelic cuteness that causes confusion.

sweet scent.name: Sweet Scent
sweet scent.description: A sweet scent that harshly lowers opposing PokÃ©mon's evasiveness.

switcheroo.name: Switcheroo
switcheroo.description: The user trades held items with the target faster than the eye can follow.

swords dance.name: Swords Dance
swords dance.description: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

synthesis.name: Synthesis
synthesis.description: The user restores its own HP. The amount of HP regained varies with the weather.

tail glow.name: Tail Glow
tail glow.description: The user stares at flashing lights to focus its mind, drastically raising its Sp. Atk stat.

tail whip.name: Tail Whip
tail whip.description: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing PokÃ©mon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

tailwind.name: Tailwind
tailwind.description: The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind that ups the Speed stat of the user and its allies for four turns.

taunt.name: Taunt
taunt.description: The target is taunted into a rage that allows it to use only attack moves for three turns.

tearful look.name: Tearful Look
tearful look.description: The user gets teary eyed to make the target lose its combative spirit. This lowers the target's Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

teeter dance.name: Teeter Dance
teeter dance.description: The user performs a wobbly dance that confuses the PokÃ©mon around it.

telekinesis.name: Telekinesis
telekinesis.description: The user makes the target float with its psychic power. The target is easier to hit for three turns.

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.description: Use it to flee from any wild PokÃ©mon.

thunder wave.name: Thunder Wave
thunder wave.description: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

tickle.name: Tickle
tickle.description: The user tickles the target into laughing, reducing its Attack and Defense stats.

topsy-turvy.name: Topsy-Turvy
topsy-turvy.description: All stat changes affecting the target turn topsy-turvy and become the opposite of what they were.

torment.name: Torment
torment.description: The user torments and enrages the target, making it incapable of using the same move twice in a row.

toxic.name: Toxic
toxic.description: A move that leaves the target badly poisoned. Its poison damage worsens every turn.

toxic spikes.name: Toxic Spikes
toxic spikes.description: The user lays a trap of poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing PokÃ©mon that switch into battle.

toxic thread.name: Toxic Thread
toxic thread.description: The user shoots poisonous threads to poison the target and lower the target's Speed stat.

transform.name: Transform
transform.description: The user transforms into a copy of the target right down to having the same move set.

trick.name: Trick
trick.description: The user catches the target off guard and swaps its held item with its own.

trick room.name: Trick Room
trick room.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which slower PokÃ©mon get to move first for five turns.

trick-or-treat.name: Trick-or-Treat
trick-or-treat.description: The user takes the target trick-or-treating. This adds Ghost type to the target's type.

venom drench.name: Venom Drench
venom drench.description: Opposing PokÃ©mon are drenched in an odd poisonous liquid. This lowers the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats of a poisoned target.

water sport.name: Water Sport
water sport.description: The user soaks the battlefield with water. This weakens Fire-type moves for five turns.

whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
whirlwind.description: The target is blown away, and a different PokÃ©mon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single PokÃ©mon.

wide guard.name: Wide Guard
wide guard.description: The user and its allies are protected from wide-ranging attacks for one turn.

will-o-wisp.name: Will-O-Wisp
will-o-wisp.description: The user shoots a sinister, bluish-white flame at the target to inflict a burn.

wish.name: Wish
wish.description: One turn after this move is used, the user's or its replacement's HP is restored by half the user's max HP.

withdraw.name: Withdraw
withdraw.description: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

wonder room.name: Wonder Room
wonder room.description: The user creates a bizarre area in which PokÃ©mon's Defense and Sp. Def stats are swapped for five turns.

work up.name: Work Up
work up.description: The user is roused, and its Attack and Sp. Atk stats increase.

worry seed.name: Worry Seed
worry seed.description: A seed that causes worry is planted on the target. It prevents sleep by making the target's Ability Insomnia.

yawn.name: Yawn
yawn.description: The user lets loose a huge yawn that lulls the target into falling asleep on the next turn.

accelerock.name: Accelerock
accelerock.description: The user smashes into the target at high speed. This move always goes first.

acid downpour.name: Acid Downpour
acid downpour.description: The user creates a poisonous swamp using its Z-Power and sinks the target into it at full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

acrobatics.name: Acrobatics
acrobatics.description: The user nimbly strikes the target. If the user is not holding an item, this attack inflicts massive damage.

aerial ace.name: Aerial Ace
aerial ace.description: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

all-out pummeling.name: All-Out Pummeling
all-out pummeling.description: The user rams an energy orb created by its Z-Power into the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

anchor shot.name: Anchor Shot
anchor shot.description: The user entangles the target with its anchor chain while attacking. The target becomes unable to flee.

aqua jet.name: Aqua Jet
aqua jet.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

aqua tail.name: Aqua Tail
aqua tail.description: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm.

arm thrust.name: Arm Thrust
arm thrust.description: The user lets loose a flurry of open-palmed arm thrusts that hit two to five times in a row.

assurance.name: Assurance
assurance.description: If the target has already taken some damage in the same turn, this attack's power is doubled.

astonish.name: Astonish
astonish.description: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch.

attack order.name: Attack Order
attack order.description: The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. Critical hits land more easily.

avalanche.name: Avalanche
avalanche.description: The power of this attack move is doubled if the user has been hurt by the target in the same turn.

barrage.name: Barrage
barrage.description: Round objects are hurled at the target to strike two to five times in a row.

beak blast.name: Beak Blast
beak blast.description: The user first heats up its beak, and then it attacks the target. Making direct contact with the PokÃ©mon while it's heating up its beak results in a burn.

beat up.name: Beat Up
beat up.description: The user gets all party PokÃ©mon to attack the target. The more party PokÃ©mon, the greater the number of attacks.

bide.name: Bide
bide.description: The user endures attacks for two turns, then strikes back to cause double the damage taken.

bind.name: Bind
bind.description: Things such as long bodies or tentacles are used to bind and squeeze the target for four to five turns.

bite.name: Bite
bite.description: The target is bitten with viciously sharp fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

black hole eclipse.name: Black Hole Eclipse
black hole eclipse.description: The user gathers dark energy using its Z-Power and sucks the target into it. The power varies, depending on the original move.

blaze kick.name: Blaze Kick
blaze kick.description: The user launches a kick that lands a critical hit more easily. This may also leave the target with a burn.

bloom doom.name: Bloom Doom
bloom doom.description: The user collects energy from plants using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

body slam.name: Body Slam
body slam.description: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

bolt strike.name: Bolt Strike
bolt strike.description: The user surrounds itself with a great amount of electricity and charges its target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

bone club.name: Bone Club
bone club.description: The user clubs the target with a bone. This may also make the target flinch.

bone rush.name: Bone Rush
bone rush.description: The user strikes the target with a hard bone two to five times in a row.

bonemerang.name: Bonemerang
bonemerang.description: The user throws the bone it holds. The bone loops around to hit the target twice coming and going.

bounce.name: Bounce
bounce.description: The user bounces up high, then drops on the target on the second turn. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

brave bird.name: Brave Bird
brave bird.description: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

breakneck blitz.name: Breakneck Blitz
breakneck blitz.description: The user builds up its momentum using its Z-Power and crashes into the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.

brick break.name: Brick Break
brick break.description: The user attacks with a swift chop. It can also break barriers, such as Light Screen and Reflect.

brutal swing.name: Brutal Swing
brutal swing.description: The user swings its body around violently to inflict damage on everything in its vicinity.

bug bite.name: Bug Bite
bug bite.description: The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

bulldoze.name: Bulldoze
bulldoze.description: The user strikes everything around it by stomping down on the ground. This lowers the Speed stat of those hit.

bullet punch.name: Bullet Punch
bullet punch.description: The user strikes the target with tough punches as fast as bullets. This move always goes first.

bullet seed.name: Bullet Seed
bullet seed.description: The user forcefully shoots seeds at the target two to five times in a row.

catastropika.name: Catastropika
catastropika.description: The user, Pikachu, surrounds itself with the maximum amount of electricity using its Z-Power and pounces on its target with full force.

chip away.name: Chip Away
chip away.description: Looking for an opening, the user strikes consistently. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

circle throw.name: Circle Throw
circle throw.description: The target is thrown, and a different PokÃ©mon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single PokÃ©mon.

clamp.name: Clamp
clamp.description: The target is clamped and squeezed by the user's very thick and sturdy shell for four to five turns.

close combat.name: Close Combat
close combat.description: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

comet punch.name: Comet Punch
comet punch.description: The target is hit with a flurry of punches that strike two to five times in a row.

constrict.name: Constrict
constrict.description: The target is attacked with long, creeping tentacles, vines, or the like. This may also lower the target's  Speed stat.

continental crush.name: Continental Crush
continental crush.description: The user summons a huge rock mountain using its Z-Power and drops it onto the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

corkscrew crash.name: Corkscrew Crash
corkscrew crash.description: The user spins very fast and rams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

counter.name: Counter
counter.description: A retaliation move that counters any physical attack, inflicting double the damage taken.

covet.name: Covet
covet.description: The user endearingly approaches the target, then steals the target's held item.

crabhammer.name: Crabhammer
crabhammer.description: The target is hammered with a large pincer. Critical hits land more easily.

cross chop.name: Cross Chop
cross chop.description: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed. Critical hits land more easily.

cross poison.name: Cross Poison
cross poison.description: A slashing attack with a poisonous blade that may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

crunch.name: Crunch
crunch.description: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

crush claw.name: Crush Claw
crush claw.description: The user slashes the target with hard and sharp claws. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

crush grip.name: Crush Grip
crush grip.description: The target is crushed with great force. The more HP the target has left, the greater this move's power.

cut.name: Cut
cut.description: The target is cut with a scythe or claw.

darkest lariat.name: Darkest Lariat
darkest lariat.description: The user swings both arms and hits the target. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

devastating drake.name: Devastating Drake
devastating drake.description: The user materializes its aura using its Z-Power and attacks the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

diamond storm.name: Diamond Storm
diamond storm.description: The user whips up a storm of diamonds to damage opposing PokÃ©mon. This may also sharply raise the user's Defense stat.

dig.name: Dig
dig.description: The user burrows, then attacks on the next turn.

dive.name: Dive
dive.description: Diving on the first turn, the user floats up and attacks on the next turn.

dizzy punch.name: Dizzy Punch
dizzy punch.description: The target is hit with rhythmically launched punches. This may also leave the target confused.

double hit.name: Double Hit
double hit.description: The user slams the target with a long tail, vines, or a tentacle. The target is hit twice in a row.

double kick.name: Double Kick
double kick.description: The target is quickly kicked twice in succession using both feet.

double slap.name: Double Slap
double slap.description: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

double-edge.name: Double-Edge
double-edge.description: A reckless, life-risking tackle. This also damages the user quite a lot.

dragon ascent.name: Dragon Ascent
dragon ascent.description: After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by dropping out of the sky at high speeds. But it lowers its own Defense and Sp. Def stats in the process.

dragon claw.name: Dragon Claw
dragon claw.description: The user slashes the target with huge sharp claws.

dragon hammer.name: Dragon Hammer
dragon hammer.description: The user uses its body like a hammer to attack the target and inflict damage.

dragon rush.name: Dragon Rush
dragon rush.description: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.

dragon tail.name: Dragon Tail
dragon tail.description: The target is knocked away, and a different PokÃ©mon is dragged out. In the wild, this ends a battle against a single PokÃ©mon.

drain punch.name: Drain Punch
drain punch.description: An energy-draining punch. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

drill peck.name: Drill Peck
drill peck.description: A corkscrewing attack with a sharp beak acting as a drill.

drill run.name: Drill Run
drill run.description: The user crashes into its target while rotating its body like a drill. Critical hits land more easily.

dual chop.name: Dual Chop
dual chop.description: The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal strikes. The target is hit twice in a row.

dynamic punch.name: Dynamic Punch
dynamic punch.description: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. This confuses the target if it hits.

earthquake.name: Earthquake
earthquake.description: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every PokÃ©mon around it.

egg bomb.name: Egg Bomb
egg bomb.description: A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum force to inflict damage.

endeavor.name: Endeavor
endeavor.description: This attack move cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP.

explosion.name: Explosion
explosion.description: The user attacks everything around it by causing a tremendous explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

extreme speed.name: Extreme Speed
extreme speed.description: The user charges the target at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

facade.name: Facade
facade.description: This attack move doubles its power if the user is poisoned, burned, or paralyzed.

fake out.name: Fake Out
fake out.description: This attack hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn the user is in battle.

false swipe.name: False Swipe
false swipe.description: A restrained attack that prevents the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

feint.name: Feint
feint.description: This attack hits a target using a move such as Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.

feint attack.name: Feint Attack
feint attack.description: The user approaches the target disarmingly, then throws a sucker punch. This attack never misses.

fell stinger.name: Fell Stinger
fell stinger.description: When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises drastically.

fire fang.name: Fire Fang
fire fang.description: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.

fire lash.name: Fire Lash
fire lash.description: The user strikes the target with a burning lash. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

fire punch.name: Fire Punch
fire punch.description: The target is punched with a fiery fist. This may also leave the target with a burn.

first impression.name: First Impression
first impression.description: Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn the user is in battle.

fissure.name: Fissure
fissure.description: The user opens up a fissure in the ground and drops the target in. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

flail.name: Flail
flail.description: The user flails about aimlessly to attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.

flame charge.name: Flame Charge
flame charge.description: Cloaking itself in flame, the user attacks. Then, building up more power, the user raises its Speed stat.

flame wheel.name: Flame Wheel
flame wheel.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges at the target. This may also leave the target with a burn.

flare blitz.name: Flare Blitz
flare blitz.description: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with a burn.

fling.name: Fling
fling.description: The user flings its held item at the target to attack. This move's power and effects depend on the item.

fly.name: Fly
fly.description: The user soars and then strikes its target on the next turn.

flying press.name: Flying Press
flying press.description: The user dives down onto the target from the sky. This move is Fighting and Flying type simultaneously.

focus punch.name: Focus Punch
focus punch.description: The user focuses its mind before launching a punch. This move fails if the user is hit before it is used.

force palm.name: Force Palm
force palm.description: The target is attacked with a shock wave. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

foul play.name: Foul Play
foul play.description: The user turns the target's power against it. The higher the target's Attack stat, the greater the move's power.

freeze shock.name: Freeze Shock
freeze shock.description: On the second turn, the user hits the target with electrically charged ice. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

frustration.name: Frustration
frustration.description: This full-power attack grows more powerful the less the user likes its Trainer.

fury attack.name: Fury Attack
fury attack.description: The target is jabbed repeatedly with a horn or beak two to five times in a row.

fury cutter.name: Fury Cutter
fury cutter.description: The target is slashed with scythes or claws. This attack becomes more powerful if it hits in succession.

fury swipes.name: Fury Swipes
fury swipes.description: The target is raked with sharp claws or scythes quickly two to five times in a row.

fusion bolt.name: Fusion Bolt
fusion bolt.description: The user throws down a giant lightning bolt. This move's power is increased when influenced by an enormous flame.

gear grind.name: Gear Grind
gear grind.description: The user attacks by throwing steel gears at its target twice.

giga impact.name: Giga Impact
giga impact.description: The user charges at the target using every bit of its power. The user can't move on the next turn.

gigavolt havoc.name: Gigavolt Havoc
gigavolt havoc.description: The user hits the target with a powerful electric current collected by its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

guillotine.name: Guillotine
guillotine.description: A vicious, tearing attack with big pincers. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

gunk shot.name: Gunk Shot
gunk shot.description: The user shoots filthy garbage at the target to attack. This may also poison the target.

gyro ball.name: Gyro Ball
gyro ball.description: The user tackles the target with a high-speed spin. The slower the user compared to the target, the greater the move's power.

hammer arm.name: Hammer Arm
hammer arm.description: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.

head charge.name: Head Charge
head charge.description: The user charges its head into its target, using its powerful guard hair. This also damages the user a little.

head smash.name: Head Smash
head smash.description: The user attacks the target with a hazardous, full-power headbutt. This also damages the user terribly.

headbutt.name: Headbutt
headbutt.description: The user sticks out its head and attacks by charging straight into the target. This may also make the target flinch.

heart stamp.name: Heart Stamp
heart stamp.description: The user unleashes a vicious blow after its cute act makes the target less wary. This may also make the target flinch.

heat crash.name: Heat Crash
heat crash.description: The user slams its target with its flame-covered body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move's power.

heavy slam.name: Heavy Slam
heavy slam.description: The user slams into the target with its heavy body. The more the user outweighs the target, the greater the move's power.

high horsepower.name: High Horsepower
high horsepower.description: The user fiercely attacks the target using its entire body.

high jump kick.name: High Jump Kick
high jump kick.description: The target is attacked with a knee kick from a jump. If it misses, the user is hurt instead.

hold back.name: Hold Back
hold back.description: The user holds back when it attacks, and the target is left with at least 1 HP.

horn attack.name: Horn Attack
horn attack.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed horn to inflict damage.

horn drill.name: Horn Drill
horn drill.description: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

horn leech.name: Horn Leech
horn leech.description: The user drains the target's energy with its horns. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

hydro vortex.name: Hydro Vortex
hydro vortex.description: The user creates a huge whirling current using its Z-Power to swallow the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

hyper fang.name: Hyper Fang
hyper fang.description: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

hyperspace fury.name: Hyperspace Fury
hyperspace fury.description: Using its many arms, the user unleashes a barrage of attacks that ignore the effects of moves like Protect and Detect. But the user's Defense stat falls.

ice ball.name: Ice Ball
ice ball.description: The user attacks the target for five turns. The move's power increases each time it hits.

ice fang.name: Ice Fang
ice fang.description: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.

ice hammer.name: Ice Hammer
ice hammer.description: The user swings and hits with its strong, heavy fist. It lowers the user's Speed, however.

ice punch.name: Ice Punch
ice punch.description: The target is punched with an icy fist. This may also leave the target frozen.

ice shard.name: Ice Shard
ice shard.description: The user flash-freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

icicle crash.name: Icicle Crash
icicle crash.description: The user attacks by harshly dropping large icicles onto the target. This may also make the target flinch.

icicle spear.name: Icicle Spear
icicle spear.description: The user launches sharp icicles at the target two to five times in a row.

inferno overdrive.name: Inferno Overdrive
inferno overdrive.description: The user breathes a stream of intense fire toward the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies depending on the original move.

iron head.name: Iron Head
iron head.description: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.

iron tail.name: Iron Tail
iron tail.description: The target is slammed with a steel-hard tail. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

jump kick.name: Jump Kick
jump kick.description: The user jumps up high, then strikes with a kick. If the kick misses, the user hurts itself.

karate chop.name: Karate Chop
karate chop.description: The target is attacked with a sharp chop. Critical hits land more easily.

knock off.name: Knock Off
knock off.description: The user slaps down the target's held item, and that item can't be used in that battle. The move does more damage if the target has a held item.

land's wrath.name: Land's Wrath
land's wrath.description: The user gathers the energy of the land and focuses that power on opposing PokÃ©mon to damage them.

last resort.name: Last Resort
last resort.description: This move can be used only after the user has used all the other moves it knows in the battle.

leaf blade.name: Leaf Blade
leaf blade.description: The user handles a sharp leaf like a sword and attacks by cutting its target. Critical hits land more easily.

leafage.name: Leafage
leafage.description: The user attacks by pelting the target with leaves.

leech life.name: Leech Life
leech life.description: The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

lick.name: Lick
lick.description: The target is licked with a long tongue, causing damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

liquidation.name: Liquidation
liquidation.description: The user slams into the target using a full-force blast of water. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

low kick.name: Low Kick
low kick.description: A powerful low kick that makes the target fall over. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

low sweep.name: Low Sweep
low sweep.description: The user makes a swift attack on the target's legs, which lowers the target's Speed stat.

lunge.name: Lunge
lunge.description: The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

mach punch.name: Mach Punch
mach punch.description: The user throws a punch at blinding speed. This move always goes first.

magnet bomb.name: Magnet Bomb
magnet bomb.description: The user launches steel bombs that stick to the target. This attack never misses.

magnitude.name: Magnitude
magnitude.description: The user attacks everything around it with a ground-shaking quake. Its power varies.

malicious moonsault.name: Malicious Moonsault
malicious moonsault.description: The user, Incineroar, strengthens its body using its Z-Power and crashes into the target with full force.

mega kick.name: Mega Kick
mega kick.description: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

mega punch.name: Mega Punch
mega punch.description: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

megahorn.name: Megahorn
megahorn.description: Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.

metal burst.name: Metal Burst
metal burst.description: The user retaliates with much greater force against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.

metal claw.name: Metal Claw
metal claw.description: The target is raked with steel claws. This may also raise the user's Attack stat.

meteor mash.name: Meteor Mash
meteor mash.description: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise the user's Attack stat.

multi-attack.name: Multi-Attack
multi-attack.description: Cloaking itself in high energy, the user slams into the target. The memory held determines the move's type.

natural gift.name: Natural Gift
natural gift.description: The user draws power to attack by using its held Berry. The Berry determines the move's type and power.

needle arm.name: Needle Arm
needle arm.description: The user attacks by wildly swinging its thorny arms. This may also make the target flinch.

never-ending nightmare.name: Never-Ending Nightmare
never-ending nightmare.description: Deep-seated grudges summoned by the user's Z-Power trap the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.

night slash.name: Night Slash
night slash.description: The user slashes the target the instant an opportunity arises. Critical hits land more easily.

nuzzle.name: Nuzzle
nuzzle.description: The user attacks by nuzzling its electrified cheeks against the target. This also leaves the target with paralysis.

outrage.name: Outrage
outrage.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

pay day.name: Pay Day
pay day.description: Numerous coins are hurled at the target to inflict damage. Money is earned after the battle.

payback.name: Payback
payback.description: The user stores power, then attacks. If the user moves after the target, this attack's power will be doubled.

peck.name: Peck
peck.description: The target is jabbed with a sharply pointed beak or horn.

petal blizzard.name: Petal Blizzard
petal blizzard.description: The user stirs up a violent petal blizzard and attacks everything around it.

phantom force.name: Phantom Force
phantom force.description: The user vanishes somewhere, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

pin missile.name: Pin Missile
pin missile.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

play rough.name: Play Rough
play rough.description: The user plays rough with the target and attacks it. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

pluck.name: Pluck
pluck.description: The user pecks the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.

poison fang.name: Poison Fang
poison fang.description: The user bites the target with toxic fangs. This may also leave the target badly poisoned.

poison jab.name: Poison Jab
poison jab.description: The target is stabbed with a tentacle or arm steeped in poison. This may also poison the target.

poison sting.name: Poison Sting
poison sting.description: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

poison tail.name: Poison Tail
poison tail.description: The user hits the target with its tail. This may also poison the target. Critical hits land more easily.

pound.name: Pound
pound.description: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

power trip.name: Power Trip
power trip.description: The user boasts its strength and attacks the target. The more the user's stats are raised, the greater the move's power.

power whip.name: Power Whip
power whip.description: The user violently whirls its vines, tentacles, or the  like to harshly lash the target.

power-up punch.name: Power-Up Punch
power-up punch.description: Striking opponents over and over makes the user's fists harder. Hitting a target raises the Attack stat.

precipice blades.name: Precipice Blades
precipice blades.description: The user attacks opposing PokÃ©mon by manifesting the power of the land in fearsome blades of stone.

present.name: Present
present.description: The user attacks by giving the target a gift with a hidden trap. It restores HP sometimes, however.

psychic fangs.name: Psychic Fangs
psychic fangs.description: The user bites the target with its psychic capabilities. This can also destroy Light Screen and Reflect.

psycho cut.name: Psycho Cut
psycho cut.description: The user tears at the target with blades formed by psychic power. Critical hits land more easily.

pulverizing pancake.name: Pulverizing Pancake
pulverizing pancake.description: Z-Power brings out the true capabilities of the user, Snorlax. The PokÃ©mon moves its enormous body energetically and attacks the target with full force.

punishment.name: Punishment
punishment.description: The more the target has powered up with stat changes, the greater the move's power.

pursuit.name: Pursuit
pursuit.description: The power of this attack move is doubled if it's used on a target that's switching out of battle.

quick attack.name: Quick Attack
quick attack.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. This move always goes first.

rage.name: Rage
rage.description: As long as this move is in use, the power of rage raises the Attack stat each time the user is hit in battle.

rapid spin.name: Rapid Spin
rapid spin.description: A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as Bind, Wrap, Leech Seed, and Spikes.

razor leaf.name: Razor Leaf
razor leaf.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing PokÃ©mon. Critical hits land more easily.

razor shell.name: Razor Shell
razor shell.description: The user cuts its target with sharp shells. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

retaliate.name: Retaliate
retaliate.description: The user gets revenge for a fainted ally. If an ally fainted in the previous turn, this move's power is increased.

return.name: Return
return.description: This full-power attack grows more powerful the more the user likes its Trainer.

revenge.name: Revenge
revenge.description: This attack move's power is doubled if the user has been hurt by the opponent in the same turn.

reversal.name: Reversal
reversal.description: An all-out attack that becomes more powerful the less HP the user has.

rock blast.name: Rock Blast
rock blast.description: The user hurls hard rocks at the target. Two to five rocks are launched in a row.

rock climb.name: Rock Climb
rock climb.description: The user attacks the target by smashing into it with incredible force. This may also confuse the target.

rock slide.name: Rock Slide
rock slide.description: Large boulders are hurled at the opposing PokÃ©mon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing PokÃ©mon flinch.

rock smash.name: Rock Smash
rock smash.description: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

rock throw.name: Rock Throw
rock throw.description: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

rock tomb.name: Rock Tomb
rock tomb.description: Boulders are hurled at the target. This also lowers the target's Speed stat by preventing its movement.

rock wrecker.name: Rock Wrecker
rock wrecker.description: The user launches a huge boulder at the target to attack. The user can't move on the next turn.

rolling kick.name: Rolling Kick
rolling kick.description: The user lashes out with a quick, spinning kick. This may also make the target flinch.

rollout.name: Rollout
rollout.description: The user continually rolls into the target over five turns. It becomes more powerful each time it hits.

sacred fire.name: Sacred Fire
sacred fire.description: The target is razed with a mystical fire of great intensity. This may also leave the target with a burn.

sacred sword.name: Sacred Sword
sacred sword.description: The user attacks by slicing with a long horn. The target's stat changes don't affect this attack's damage.

sand tomb.name: Sand Tomb
sand tomb.description: The user traps the target inside a harshly raging sandstorm for four to five turns.

savage spin-out.name: Savage Spin-Out
savage spin-out.description: The user binds the target with full force with threads of silk that the user spits using its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

scratch.name: Scratch
scratch.description: Hard, pointed, sharp claws rake the target to inflict damage.

secret power.name: Secret Power
secret power.description: The additional effects of this attack depend upon where it was used.

seed bomb.name: Seed Bomb
seed bomb.description: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

seismic toss.name: Seismic Toss
seismic toss.description: The target is thrown using the power of gravity. It inflicts damage equal to the user's level.

self-destruct.name: Self-Destruct
self-destruct.description: The user attacks everything around it by causing an explosion. The user faints upon using this move.

shadow bone.name: Shadow Bone
shadow bone.description: The user attacks by beating the target with a bone that contains a spirit. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

shadow claw.name: Shadow Claw
shadow claw.description: The user slashes with a sharp claw made from shadows. Critical hits land more easily.

shadow force.name: Shadow Force
shadow force.description: The user disappears, then strikes the target on the next turn. This move hits even if the target protects itself.

shadow punch.name: Shadow Punch
shadow punch.description: The user throws a punch from the shadows. This attack never misses.

shadow sneak.name: Shadow Sneak
shadow sneak.description: The user extends its shadow and attacks the target from behind. This move always goes first.

shattered psyche.name: Shattered Psyche
shattered psyche.description: The user controls the target with its Z-Power and hurts the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

sinister arrow raid.name: Sinister Arrow Raid
sinister arrow raid.description: The user, Decidueye, creates countless arrows using its Z-Power and shoots the target with full force.

skull bash.name: Skull Bash
skull bash.description: The user tucks in its head to raise its Defense stat on the first turn, then rams the target on the next turn.

sky attack.name: Sky Attack
sky attack.description: A second-turn attack move where critical hits land more easily. This may also make the target flinch.

sky drop.name: Sky Drop
sky drop.description: The user takes the target into the sky, then drops it during the next turn. The target cannot attack while in the sky.

sky uppercut.name: Sky Uppercut
sky uppercut.description: The user attacks the target with an uppercut thrown skyward with force.

slam.name: Slam
slam.description: The target is slammed with a long tail, vines, or the like to inflict damage.

slash.name: Slash
slash.description: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades. Critical hits land more easily.

smack down.name: Smack Down
smack down.description: The user throws a stone or similar projectile to attack an opponent. A flying PokÃ©mon will fall to the ground when it's hit.

smart strike.name: Smart Strike
smart strike.description: The user stabs the target with a sharp horn. This attack never misses.

smelling salts.name: Smelling Salts
smelling salts.description: This attack's power is doubled when used on a target with paralysis. This also cures the target's paralysis, however.

solar blade.name: Solar Blade
solar blade.description: In this two-turn attack, the user gathers light and fills a blade with the light's energy, attacking the target on the next turn.

soul-stealing 7-star strike.name: Soul-Stealing 7-Star Strike
soul-stealing 7-star strike.description: After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Marshadow, punches and kicks the target consecutively with full force.

spark.name: Spark
spark.description: The user throws an electrically charged tackle at the target. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

spectral thief.name: Spectral Thief
spectral thief.description: The user hides in the target's shadow, steals the target's stat boosts, and then attacks.

spike cannon.name: Spike Cannon
spike cannon.description: Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.

spirit shackle.name: Spirit Shackle
spirit shackle.description: The user attacks while simultaneously stitching the target's shadow to the ground to prevent the target from escaping.

steamroller.name: Steamroller
steamroller.description: The user crushes its target by rolling over the target with its rolled-up body. This may also make the target flinch.

steel wing.name: Steel Wing
steel wing.description: The target is hit with wings of steel. This may also raise the user's Defense stat.

stomp.name: Stomp
stomp.description: The target is stomped with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

stomping tantrum.name: Stomping Tantrum
stomping tantrum.description: Driven by frustration, the user attacks the target. If the user's previous move has failed, the power of this move doubles.

stone edge.name: Stone Edge
stone edge.description: The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones. Critical hits land more easily.

storm throw.name: Storm Throw
storm throw.description: The user strikes the target with a fierce blow. This attack always results in a critical hit.

strength.name: Strength
strength.description: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.

struggle.name: Struggle
struggle.description: This attack is used in desperation only if the user has no PP. It also damages the user a little.

submission.name: Submission
submission.description: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.

subzero slammer.name: Subzero Slammer
subzero slammer.description: The user dramatically drops the temperature using its Z-Power and freezes the target with full force. The power varies, depending on the original move.

sucker punch.name: Sucker Punch
sucker punch.description: This move enables the user to attack first. This move fails if the target is not readying an attack.

sunsteel strike.name: Sunsteel Strike
sunsteel strike.description: The user slams into the target with the force of a meteor. This move can be used on the target  regardless of its Abilities.

super fang.name: Super Fang
super fang.description: The user chomps hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This cuts the target's HP in half.

superpower.name: Superpower
superpower.description: The user attacks the target with great power. However, this also lowers the user's Attack and Defense stats.

supersonic skystrike.name: Supersonic Skystrike
supersonic skystrike.description: The user soars up with its Z-Power and plummets toward the target at full speed. The power varies, depending on the original move.

tackle.name: Tackle
tackle.description: A physical attack in which the user charges and slams into the target with its whole body.

tail slap.name: Tail Slap
tail slap.description: The user attacks by striking the target with its hard tail. It hits the target two to five times in a row.

take down.name: Take Down
take down.description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

tectonic rage.name: Tectonic Rage
tectonic rage.description: The user burrows deep into the ground and slams into the target with the full force of its Z-Power. The power varies, depending on the original move.

thief.name: Thief
thief.description: The user attacks and steals the target's held item simultaneously. The user can't steal anything if it already holds an item.

thousand arrows.name: Thousand Arrows
thousand arrows.description: This move also hits opposing PokÃ©mon that are in the air. Those PokÃ©mon are knocked down to the ground.

thousand waves.name: Thousand Waves
thousand waves.description: The user attacks with a wave that crawls along the ground. Those hit can't flee from battle.

thrash.name: Thrash
thrash.description: The user rampages and attacks for two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.

throat chop.name: Throat Chop
throat chop.description: The user attacks the target's throat, and the resultant suffering prevents the target from using moves that emit sound for two turns.

thunder fang.name: Thunder Fang
thunder fang.description: The user bites with electrified fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with paralysis.

thunder punch.name: Thunder Punch
thunder punch.description: The target is punched with an electrified fist. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

triple kick.name: Triple Kick
triple kick.description: A consecutive three-kick attack that becomes more powerful with each successive hit.

trop kick.name: Trop Kick
trop kick.description: The user lands an intense kick of tropical origins on the target. This also lowers the target's Attack stat.

twineedle.name: Twineedle
twineedle.description: The user damages the target twice in succession by jabbing it with two spikes. This may also poison the target.

twinkle tackle.name: Twinkle Tackle
twinkle tackle.description: The user creates a very charming space using its Z-Power and totally toys with the target. The power varies, depending on the original move.

u-turn.name: U-turn
u-turn.description: After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party PokÃ©mon in waiting.

v-create.name: V-create
v-create.description: With a hot flame on its forehead, the user hurls itself at its target. This lowers the user's Defense, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

vice grip.name: Vice Grip
vice grip.description: The target is gripped and squeezed from both sides to inflict damage.

vine whip.name: Vine Whip
vine whip.description: The target is struck with slender, whiplike vines to inflict damage.

vital throw.name: Vital Throw
vital throw.description: The user attacks last. In return, this throw move never misses.

volt tackle.name: Volt Tackle
volt tackle.description: The user electrifies itself and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with paralysis.

wake-up slap.name: Wake-Up Slap
wake-up slap.description: This attack inflicts big damage on a sleeping target. This also wakes the target up, however.

waterfall.name: Waterfall
waterfall.description: The user charges at the target and may make it flinch.

wild charge.name: Wild Charge
wild charge.description: The user shrouds itself in electricity and smashes into its target. This also damages the user a little.

wing attack.name: Wing Attack
wing attack.description: The target is struck with large, imposing wings spread wide to inflict damage.

wood hammer.name: Wood Hammer
wood hammer.description: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. This also damages the user quite a lot.

wrap.name: Wrap
wrap.description: A long body, vines, or the like are used to wrap and  squeeze the target for four to five turns.

x-scissor.name: X-Scissor
x-scissor.description: The user slashes at the target by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.

zen headbutt.name: Zen Headbutt
zen headbutt.description: The user focuses its willpower to its head and attacks the target. This may also make the target flinch.

zing zap.name: Zing Zap
zing zap.description: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target, giving it an electric shock. This may also make the target flinch.

10000000 volt thunderbolt.name: 10000000 Volt Thunderbolt
10000000 volt thunderbolt.description: The user, Pikachu wearing a cap, powers up a jolt of electricity using its Z-Power and unleashes it. Critical hits land more easily.

absorb.name: Absorb
absorb.description: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

acid.name: Acid
acid.description: The opposing PokÃ©mon are attacked with a spray of harsh acid. This may also lower their Sp. Def stat.

acid spray.name: Acid Spray
acid spray.description: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat.

aeroblast.name: Aeroblast
aeroblast.description: A vortex of air is shot at the target to inflict damage. Critical hits land more easily.

air cutter.name: Air Cutter
air cutter.description: The user launches razor-like wind to slash the opposing PokÃ©mon. Critical hits land more easily.

air slash.name: Air Slash
air slash.description: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

ancient power.name: Ancient Power
ancient power.description: The user attacks with a prehistoric power. This may also raise all the user's stats at once.

aura sphere.name: Aura Sphere
aura sphere.description: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.

aurora beam.name: Aurora Beam
aurora beam.description: The target is hit with a rainbow-colored beam. This may also lower the target's Attack stat.

belch.name: Belch
